item.title: RetroScape Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“Retroscape, post:3, topic:455144”]You are correct this has been based on creativescape. To be fair I havent changed much, whats the point creativescape was a beefy server any way. There is so many feature in this server. Sometimes its best to go back to basic. Thanks for your comment. By the way all servers have glitches I will try my best to rectify these problems as they arise.

Thanks james.[/quote]
Disable duel arena, there is a dupe there that i can’t seem to fix, and don’t give players items for donating. Remember to put your admins on dupecheck so when you spawn you don’t get banned. There is a trade glitch(If you DC or logout you loose items while in trade) so you have to make a destruct method or something like that in Player.java, I’m not so good at java so not sure.

Read full topic

item.title: RetroScape Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @Retroscape Retroscape
item.description:
@Retroscape wrote:

You are correct this has been based on creativescape. To be fair I havent changed much, whats the point creativescape was a beefy server any way. There is so many feature in this server. Sometimes its best to go back to basic. Thanks for your comment. By the way all servers have glitches I will try my best to rectify these problems as they arise.

Thanks james.

Read full topic

item.title: RetroScape Oldschool Server
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

Looks like a creativescape leech, so what did you change on this server?Did you clip firemaking? I’m sure you’ll find it a bother when you go deeper into the server.

Also I’ve seen about 10 other servers with the same name.

Read full topic
